activity.text:
Hi!! @nihal467 Can I work on this please
My proposed solution:

- Show an input field inside the dropdown when the user enters a tag that doesnâ€™t exist.
- Provide a button (e.g., "Create New Tag") to add the tag dynamically.
- Detect when the entered tag does not exist in the dropdown list.
- Show an input field inside the dropdown for users to add a new tag.
- After successful creation, update the dropdown list with the new tag without requiring a page refresh.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11163
activity.text:
@srijan2607 @rithviknishad , Could I work on this issue please?
My solution is to enhance the password visibility toggle button with proper ARIA attributes
We can modify src/components/ui/input-password.tsx to include:
- **aria-label:** Describes the buttonâ€™s purpose (Show password / Hide password).
- **aria-pressed:** Indicates whether the password is currently visible.
- **title (optional)**: Provides a tooltip for sighted users.
ETA: 2 days
